entry.title: $2700 // ==NO FEE= GORGEOUS 2 BED IN PROSPECT HEIGHTS! DONT SLEEP RUN!
entry.content:
Amazing and modern 2 Bedroom apartment in fully renovated Brownstone building Located in the Heart of Prospect heights, on Saint Marks Ave and Franklin And, a Gorgeous tree lined Block!

Between the A,C and the 2, 3, 4, 5, S F train lines!!
Franklin Ave's and all of it's trend bars and shops (Little Zelda, Dutch Boy Burger, Starbucks, Barboccino, Etc)

the building offers:
On premises Laundry, A Finished wooden roof deck with a Breathtaking view, A private Storage room For every apt.

Apartment :
2 large bedroom with great widow's and closets

Tall ceilings , exposed brick , central air and heat

Modern bathroom with tub and shower

Modern kitchen with high-end stainless steal kitchen appliances including a dishwasher

Central air and heat, tall ceilings, hardwood flooring, video intercom system

Laundry and Storage in the building.

In building laundry room
Private storage unit for each apartment Roof deck with amazing views
No brokers fee - Showing by appointment
Guarantors accepted
Pets Allowed * Upon approval

entry.title: $2599 // WILL BE GONE SOON! LAUNDRY IN UNIT! BALCONY! RIGHT NEAR PARK!
entry.content:

THIS IS A SPACIOUS APARTMENT WITH AMAZING AMENITIES!

***WASHER/DRYER IN UNIT***

*TWO Spacious bedrooms
*Brand New Modern Kitchen with Granite Countertops
*Stainless Steel Appliances
*DISHWASHER and Microwave
*Tons of Natural Lighting Throughout The Apartment
*Brand New Full Retiled Bathroom

*PRIVATE BALCONY; PERFECT FOR THOSE SUMMER CHILLS*


***HEAT AND HOT WATER INCLUDED***


Right next to the 2,3,4, and 5 trains, making it a short ride to the city!

AMAZING location, quick walk to great restaurants, shops, grocery stores, and bars!!!


***PETS ALLOWED***
***NO FEE***
***GUARANTORS WELCOME***

Call or email TODAY for a PRIVATE showing before it's gone!
